titleStmt.title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation ... whereas it hath been represented unto us by the Levant Company ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first line of text.
"Given at the council chamber at Whitehall, the eight and twentieth day of May, 1696. In the eighth year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
